H0.text: What word is used to describe someone who is neither left or right handed, but can use both hands with equal ease. Ambidextrous

H1.text: What word is used to describe someone who is neither left or right handed, but can use both hands with equal ease. Crossdominant

H2.text: What word is used to describe someone who is neither left or right handed, but can use both hands with equal ease. Handedless

H3.text: What word is used to describe someone who is neither left or right handed, but can use both hands with equal ease. Ambisinister

A4.text: Ambidexterity is the ability to use both the right and left hand equally well.

A5.text: The term 'ambisinistral' can be directly interpreted as 'both left' or 'both sinister'.
